MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML7 postcode area of Harthill affecting properties in East Main Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.46am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair an underground cable fault located outside 1 Main Street affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.55am on Thursday 25th February 2021.
